title: 234: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: FANTASY SUITES
itunes:title: 234: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: FANTASY SUITES
description:
The Broads are here to discuss the Fantasy Suite episode of Matt James’ season with Michelle, Bri, and Rachael. First they discuss theories on next week, their own fantasy suites, and then they dive into the episode - going over Matt’s discussion with his father, Rachel Lindsay's thoughts on “Bachelor Party”, Michelle’s food spa date, Bri’s outdoor date (again!), Rachael’s breakdown and then fireworks, a whole lot of tangents and much more! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
